materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of Montgomery Hall in Lahore. There is a path leading up to a large building.  There are two men standing in a porch in front of the bulding. On the right of the picture, there is a horse carriage with a driver. The building is fronted by four tall columns. The pediment reads 'Montgomery'. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Montgomery Hall, Lahore
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Lahore (Pakistan) Government buildings Columns Colonization Quaid-i-Azam Library
